featured.text: Oh, how wonderful! (C) Oh, that was great!
Concert reviews from the period mourned the fact that the armonica sounded wonderful—only when it could be heard.
All we hear is the scratching of pencil on paper, the sound of pigeons, and the delivery of inter-office correspondence by paper airplane. Wonderful!
To congratulate Tom on his wonderful achievement.

other.text: Pets are wonderful, B.…with the freshest ingredients.
He viewed the kidnapping as a wonderful camping trip.
Many children were upset to hear about the __38__ death of these wonderful sea creatures and decided to help __39__ them.
